alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 15 at 8:18PM PDT until October 15 at 9:15PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Diego has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... San Bernardino County in southern California... * Until 915 PM PDT. * At 816 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Apple Valley, moving southwest at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... San Bernardino, Victorville, Hesperia, Apple Valley, I-15 Through The Cajon Pass, Lake Arrowhead. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
